description: Test suite for the 'Agent' class in the 'agno' package, testing tool integrations and asynchronous behavior in the 'openrouter' model context.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool usage with the 'YFinanceTools' in the 'Agent' model.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response with tool usage and intermediate steps.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use
methods.description: Asynchronous test for tool usage with 'YFinanceTools'.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test for tool usage.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple tools being called in a single response.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function without parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_optional_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function with optional parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Tests a tool that handles multiple URLs and content extraction.
